Sentencas: Infiltration-based composite electrodes are one of the most promising structures to obtain solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with high performance.
Titulo: Fluid Mechanical Approaches for Rational Design of Infiltrated Electrodes of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: For a rational design of advanced composite electrodes, we report here a comprehensive model based on fluid mechanics by using the Peclet number and contact angle hysteresis to precisely control the morphologies of the infiltrated nanoparticles.
Titulo: Fluid Mechanical Approaches for Rational Design of Infiltrated Electrodes of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Depending on the key parameter, the drying rate, three distinct morphologies-film-like coating, discrete coating, and concentrated coating-were suggested for the model and confirmed through experiments on the infiltration of the electrode material into the porous electrolyte scaffold.
Titulo: Fluid Mechanical Approaches for Rational Design of Infiltrated Electrodes of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We believe that these results can provide an in-depth understanding of the infiltration process, which will help in arriving at simple fabrication guidelines for designing advanced nanostructures using wet chemical processes.
Titulo: Fluid Mechanical Approaches for Rational Design of Infiltrated Electrodes of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
